Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Misbegot \Mis`be*got"\, Misbegotten \Mis`be*got"ten\, p. a. 1. Unlawfully or irregularly begotten; of bad or disreputable origin; pernicious. ``Valor misbegot.'' --Shak. [1913 Webster]
2. Poorly designed or planned; badly carried out; ill-conceived. [PJC]
misbegotten adj : born out of wedlock; "the dominions of both rulers passed away to their spurious or doubtful offspring"- E.A.Freeman [syn: {bastard}, {bastardly}, {misbegot}, {spurious}]
